snippet: Hollywood has lined up behind Tom Cruise, one of its top-grossing performers.
abstract: Hollywood studios are lining up to support Tom Cruise, one of its top-grossing performers, as news that his wife Kate Holmes is divorcing him after five years provides more grist for the celebrity-media gossip mill; are betting that Cruise will be able to successfully bounce back yet again from the scandal with his reputation and popularity intact.

byline.original: By BROOKS BARNES and MICHAEL CIEPLY
byline.contributor: Joseph Goldstein and Colin Moynihan contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: Hollywood has lined up behind Tom Cruise, one of its top-grossing performers.

headline.seo: Tom Cruise Specializes in Career Repair
